title: Sainsbury's typeface
content:
[http://www.sainsburys.co.uk/home.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203232255/http:/www.sainsburys.co.uk/home.htm)

What typeface is the Sainsbury's logo in? What about the strapline? (try something new today)
author: missgiggles

comments.content: The strapline (try something new today) is written by hand. Just look at the different y, o, a, e , t.
Sainsbury's font is custom used also by [J Sainsbury plc](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203232255/http:/www.jsainsburys.co.uk/) by Miles Newlyn.

If you want something similar to the strapline try Wendy.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/wendy/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203232255/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/wendy/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/wendy/")
aah ok. Thanks for the info everyone.
